mapper.select: SELECT sc.id AS courseId, sc.student_id, sc.course, sc.start_date, sc.expected_completion_date, as_table.id AS applicationStatusId, as_table.application_status FROM students_courses sc JOIN application_status as_table ON sc.id = as_table.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (full_name, furigana, nick_name, email_address, area, age, sex, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{furigana}, #{nickname}, #{emailAddress}, #{area}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses (student_id, course, start_date, expected_completion_date) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{course}, #{startDate}, #{expectedCompletionDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students_courses SET course = #{course} WHERE id = #{id}
